data.decision: Priority improvements for Duro based on AI memory research: (1) Add temporal validity to facts with valid_from/valid_until fields, (2) Link facts to decisions that used them, (3) Implement confidence decay over time unless reinforced
data.rationale: Zep's temporal knowledge graph shows value of tracking when facts change. Cognee's graph approach demonstrates importance of relationship links. Academic survey identifies dynamics (evolution) as key gap in current memory systems.
alternatives: Adopt full external tool like Mem0
data.context: Research on AI agent memory tools: Mem0, Zep, Letta, Cognee, and arXiv:2512.13564 survey
